name: Test Nacho Wings
ingredients: 2 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend or  shredded cheddar cheese
Optional toppings: Seeded jalapeno slices, salsa, sour cream and guacamole
instructions: Dip wing sections in butter, then roll in crushed nacho chips.
baking pan until juices run clear, 45-50 minutes.
Top with cheese, chiles, green onions and, if desired, jalapeno slices.
Return to oven and bake until cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.
Serve with optional toppings as desired.
